name: Key West TriLattice Hammock Pergola Plan – 10x10 Triangular Pergola with Lattice Walls
open_features: 24×24×18 in concrete footings with #5 bar reinforcement
6×6 SP No.2 posts on Simpson ABU66Z bases
Lattice walls: 2×4 vertical battens + 2×2 diagonal battens (privacy + hammock support)
Beam-to-post through-bolts, Simpson column caps, hurricane clips
safety_note: Plans are preliminary – final engineering, local permitting, and code compliance required.
